title: friendships
description:
romantic relationships can be complicated, but so can friendships. ive been taking some time lately to reflect on what truly makes a good friendship. so this ep i'm going to explain the 6 criteria i think should be a part of a good friendship, so hopefully you guys can apply those to yours and re-evaluate some that aren't fulfilling.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
